channel.title: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?
channel.description:
Hi i was just woundering how i make npcs talk
I have been trying to find it for a long while but no luck
I dont mean speach
I mean They talk it Thanks
Paintball

item.title: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:9, topic:274903”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=363197.msg2759001#msg2759001 date=1240414330]
Leech from Czar.
[/quote]
lol, you complain about people leeching, and your telling people to leech now?
________problem solved no need to post[/quote]
It’s called using your brain to minimize effort. Why would you try to write your own method when you can just use a method that has already been created for you? I’m only talking about one method, not the entire source.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?

item.title: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:274903”]If thinking about Czar, Go into NPCHandler class and add this in the process method:

XXXX is the NPC ID

 if (npcs[i].npcType == XXXX) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "What Ever Your NPC says!";
                        }
                    }

jc22493, I know leeching from Czar is the best way but now I understand where you get your 4k posts![/quote]
By not spoon-feeding? Yes.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?

item.title: How Do I make it so NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If thinking about Czar, Go into NPCHandler class and add this in the process method:

XXXX is the NPC ID

 if (npcs[i].npcType == XXXX) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "What Ever Your NPC says!";
                        }
                    }

jc22493, I know leeching from Czar is the best way but now I understand where you get your 4k posts!

Read full topic
